data.name: Doxxed
data.detailed_description: After a botched face-lift, Gin, a movie star, confines herself to her luxury apartment to recover. Under the influence of strong pain medications she makes the mistake of taking to the online blogs - discovering her once adoring fans may have turned against her. A first-person puzzle thriller, you play as Gin as you try to figure out whose responsible for the cryptic messages and strange deliveries arriving at Gin’s apartment. You’ll have to follow clues to discover how Gin’s threatening fans are getting their information, and whether your apartment is really the safest place. Will you escape the constant threat of danger from the fans whose obsession with Gin has turned fatal?
data.about_the_game: After a botched face-lift, Gin, a movie star, confines herself to her luxury apartment to recover. Under the influence of strong pain medications she makes the mistake of taking to the online blogs - discovering her once adoring fans may have turned against her. A first-person puzzle thriller, you play as Gin as you try to figure out whose responsible for the cryptic messages and strange deliveries arriving at Gin’s apartment. You’ll have to follow clues to discover how Gin’s threatening fans are getting their information, and whether your apartment is really the safest place. Will you escape the constant threat of danger from the fans whose obsession with Gin has turned fatal?
data.short_description: After a botched face lift, a movie star confines herself to her penthouse apartment where she learns that her fans’ obsession may have turned fatal. Is her apartment really the safest place to be? Follow the clues and try to stay sane when it seems like the entire world has turned against you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-11700K @ 3.60GHz 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
